entry.title: Bedtime Books and Brews
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,160Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 20

Summary: Loud neighbors made it impossible for Derek to write in his own apartment. Thankfully he found Bedtime Books and Brews, an all night bookstore and coffee shop, and its owner, Stiles StilinskiStiles off-handedly mentions his fantasy world that he daydreams about. Derek uses it as an excuse to talk to Stiles. Eventually he falls in love with the fantasy world because it’s just so Stiles so he starts taking notes about Stiles’s ramblings. Sometimes he’ll come in and ask really specific questions about the world. A couple years later, Derek gives Stiles his manuscript and it’s the world Stiles made up.

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,500Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 18

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: Lay My Curses Out to Rest
entry.summary:
Author: sponfawn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,018Chapters: 2/14Kudos: 32

Summary: "Are you there, God? It's me, Stiles. Look, I know I never really went to Mass or anything like a good Polish kid but could you do me a big one and have this whole thing be entirely Not related to the supernatural - hell, it could be super cartel related but no shapeshifters, or chaos spirits, or fear monsters, or deranged Hunters, or fucking human sacrifices of any kind. Just do this for once and I'll do whatever. Well, not whatever, but I dunno I'll be a good son. You like that “honor thy father” stuff, right? I'll honor the fuck out of my dad, even come to visit more often! Confucius will weep at the intensity of my filial piety. Deal? Just. PLEASE."It's 2027 - a decade since Stiles was last in Beacon Hills - and the FBI has sent Stiles back to investigate a smuggling case.ORIn which I attempt to write the kind of story I want to read. A future Sterek fic that: 1) is in character, 2) doesn't bash any characters, 3) fixes Davis' timeline, 4) doesn't have sex, 5) has some character interactions that don't just revolve around Sterek/Stiles/Derek, and 6) addresses Derek and Stiles' unique traumas.

entry.title: Haste and Love
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,759Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: Stiles had always been the beautiful kind of chaos in Derek’s life — loud, messy, full of love and impossible lists. A storm of laughter and heart.But then, little by little, he began to fade.He forgot names. Then faces. Then feelings.No diagnosis, just silence and fear in everyone's eyes.The days split into good and bad ones.And the good ones stopped showing up.Stiles said goodbye the way people fall in love — slowly, in pieces. Through gifts, quiet smiles, and promises left behind.Derek held on. To him. To the house. To love.Even when love wasn’t enough to stop it.This is a story about remembering — and letting go.About not saving the person you love, and loving them still.About what waits beyond grief.Because Derek believed.He waited.And in the end, Stiles kept his promise.> “When you finally come see me, bring flowers.But don’t be sad.I’ll be waiting for you like I always did —in haste and love.” <

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,315Chapters: 10/19Kudos: 368

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: Community: Beacon Hills Edition
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 961Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: Beacon Hills is finally quiet—but that doesn't mean the pack is. With supernatural threats behind them (for now), Lydia insists on a monthly potluck to celebrate what they’ve built: a true community.Derek and Stiles are navigating the weird, unfamiliar comfort of being settled—together—and trying not to freak out about how domestic their life has become. As the pack gathers at the newly built Stilinski-Hale house, chaos, chili, and group chats collide in the way only a Beacon Hills gathering can.Featuring Scott and Allison being gross in love, Erica and Boyd bringing the spice, Liam’s questionable cooking choices, and Peter Hale pretending he didn’t enjoy hosting… too much. It's messy, warm, found-family fluff—with a whole lot of Sterek at its heart.

entry.title: RUNNING POINT
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,115Chapters: 3/13Kudos: 3

Summary: Summer returns to Beacon Hills, but peace does not follow. Derek no longer plans to leave and finds himself under the tutelage of someone long thought dead and whose reappearance rewrites his idea of rules, legacy, and power. Meanwhile Stiles begins to unravel. His magic is growing unstable, his health is faltering, and time is counting down. This summer the balance of power shifts and not everyone who claims neutrality is truly without agenda.

entry.title: The Tiger and the Wolf
entry.summary:
Author: SuperCraig96

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 115,348Chapters: 51/?Kudos: 37

Summary: Everyone in Scott's circle had already found their soulmate: Stiles with Derek, Allison with Isaac… only he was alone. Scott was happy for his friends, especially for Stiles, but he felt lonely. Every day, he stared at the two letters, the initials of his soulmate, whom he didn't know: L and A, hoping to finally meet him. (Soulmate AU)
